create

public Event create(java.lang.String pattern,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> headers,
                    byte[] payload,
                    java.lang.String contentType,
                    java.lang.String contentEncoding,
                    int priority,
                    java.util.Date timestamp,
                    boolean isPersistent,
                    java.lang.String applicationID)
Description copied from interface: EventFactory
Creates a consumable event.

Specified by:
create in interface EventFactory
Parameters:
pattern - the pattern that identifies the namespace node under which the event has been published.
headers - the event headers
payload - the informative content of the event
contentType - the media type of the payload
contentEncoding - the encoding of the payload
priority - the event priority
timestamp - the time when the event has been issued
isPersistent - true if the event is persistent, false otherwise
applicationID - the unique identifier of the event publisher.
Returns:
an event
